import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import "../../assets/styles/checkout.css"; import ContainerToastComponent from "../../components/ToastMessageComponents/ContainerToastComponent"; import * as yup from "yup"; const schema = yup.object().shape({ address: yup .string() .required("Tỉnh/Thành phố, Quận/Huyện, Phường/Xã là bắt buộc"), addressSpecific: yup.string().required("Địa chỉ cụ thể là bắt buộc"), emailReceiver: yup .string() .email("Email không hợp lệ") .required("Email là bắt buộc"), phoneReceiver: yup.string().required("Số điện thoại là bắt buộc"), }); const CheckOut = () => { const cartStore = useSelector((state) => state.cart.listProducts); const [toasts, setToasts] = useState([]); const [shippingValue, setShippingValue] = useState(null); const [total, setTotal] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { setTotal( cartStore.reduce( (total, product) => total + product.priceProduct * product.quantityProduct, 0 ) ); total >= 1000000 ? setShippingValue(0) : setShippingValue(30000); }, [cartStore, total]); const hanldeChangeShippingMethod = (value) => { setShippingValue(Number(value)); }; const { register, handleSubmit, control, setValue, formState: { errors }, } = useForm({ resolver: yupResolver(schema), }); const handleCheckOut = () => {}; return (

); }; export default CheckOut;
